subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: DeMar DeRozan scored 20 points to lead the Raptors to a 100-91 preseason victory over the Knicks in Andrea Bargnani’s return to Toronto.
snippet: DeMar DeRozan scored 20 points to lead the Raptors to a 100-91 preseason victory over the Knicks in Andrea Bargnani’s return to Toronto.
